casebody.data:
[Cite as 07/14/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-3689.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

July 14, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2003-0528. State ex rel. R.W. Sidley, Inc. v. Crawford.

Franklin App. No. 02AP-99, 2003-Ohio-625. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Franklin County. On July 10, 2003, appellant filed a request for extension of time to file a reply brief that was due July 8, 2003. Whereas S.Ct.Prac.R. XIV(IXC) prohibits untimely filings,

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that the request for extension of time to file a reply brief be, and hereby is, stricken.
